items.text:
In your activity's onCreate() method,
  create an instance of the Fused Location Provider Client as the following code snippet shows.
items.href: Get the last known location  |  Android Developers

items.text:
To request the last known location, call the
  getLastLocation()
  method.
items.href: Get the last known location  |  Android Developers

items.text:
Check whether the location retrieved is significantly newer than the
  previously fetched location.
items.href: Get the last known location  |  Android Developers

items.text:
Check whether the accuracy claimed by the location is better or worse
  than that of the previous estimate.

items.text: Check the provider that's associated with the new location.

items.text:
Decide
  whether you trust this provider more than the one used in your app's cached
  location.
